name: Noxii
description:
A game prototype vennyoot and I made in our second semester at Sheridan college. The project spanned two of our classes and the project was done over approximately 6 weeks. 

Vennyoot's main role was as the artist.
My main role was programming.
However, we both helped each other out a lot and worked together on multiple things such as the story line.

Keep in mind this was made before we knew how to use Unity and c# well :)

Controls are found in the game, enjoy!
